channel.title: spotify on Gustav Jansson
channel.description: Recent content in spotify on Gustav Jansson

item.title: A fix for spotify filling up the C: drive
item.description: I recently got a notice that my SSD C: drive was getting low on space and after a quick check with WinDirStat I noticed that spoitfy was filling it up with loads of weird files in the AppData\Local\Spotify\Data folder, even after I have moved my cache location. It turns out the “cached location” is only the saved playlists, and the Data folder is the cached songs that arent in a playlist.
